response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is worth significantly more than its face value. It's designed to enhance your daily life and provide you with unparalleled benefits. Considering its exceptional quality and versatility, I would like to propose a special introductory price of $150 for you. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a fantastic opportunity to experience the true value of this product. I believe it will exceed your expectations and bring immense satisfaction. Please let me know if you're interested in taking advantage of this offer.", "product_price": 150}
